attributes.action: That any person found guilty of committing a criminal act shall lose all claim to Human Rights.
attributes.additional_details: That any person upon reaching the age of majority being found guilty of committing any criminal act whilst resident in the UK or by any UK resident being charged in committing any criminal act whilst overseas cannot rely on protection to avoid extradition by whatever reason. Further that any person being found guilty whilst in persuit of any criminal act within the shores of the United Kingdom shall lose all and any claim under The Human Rights Legislation.
